admins.name: admins
admins.description: A list of administrators for the instance crypto units. See [instructions](https://github.com/terraform-ibm-modules/terraform-ibm-hpcs#before-you-begin) to create administrator signature keys. You can set up to 8 administrators. Required if auto_initialization_using_recovery_crypto_units set to true.

auto_initialization_using_recovery_crypt.name: auto_initialization_using_recovery_crypto_units
auto_initialization_using_recovery_crypt.description: Set to true if auto initialization using recovery crypto units is required.

base64_encoded_admins.name: base64_encoded_admins
base64_encoded_admins.description: A list of up to 8 administrators for the instance crypto units. Required if auto_initialization_using_recovery_crypto_units is set to true. Pass the signature keys as base64 encoded values. For information about administrator signature keys, see the readme file.

create_timeout.name: create_timeout
create_timeout.description: Create timeout value of the HPCS instance.

delete_timeout.name: delete_timeout
delete_timeout.description: Delete timeout value of the HPCS instance.

hsm_connector_id.name: hsm_connector_id
hsm_connector_id.description: The HSM connector ID provided by IBM required for Hybrid HPCS. Available to selected customers only.

name.name: name
name.description: The name to give the Hyper Protect Crypto Service instance. Max length allowed is 30 chars.

number_of_crypto_units.name: number_of_crypto_units
number_of_crypto_units.description: The number of operational crypto units for your service instance.

number_of_failover_units.name: number_of_failover_units
number_of_failover_units.description: The number of failover crypto units for your service instance. Default is 0 and cross-region high availability will not be enabled.

plan.name: plan
plan.description: The name of the service plan that you choose for your Hyper Protect Crypto Service instance.

region.name: region
region.description: The region where you want to deploy your instance.

resource_group_id.name: resource_group_id
resource_group_id.description: The resource group name where the Hyper Protect Crypto Service instance will be created.

revocation_threshold.name: revocation_threshold
revocation_threshold.description: The number of administrator signatures required to remove an administrator after you leave imprint mode. Required if auto_initialization_using_recovery_crypto_units set to true.

service_endpoints.name: service_endpoints
service_endpoints.description: The service_endpoints to access your service instance. Used only if auto_initialization_using_recovery_crypto_units is set to true. Can be set to private-only if Terraform has access to the private endpoints. Default value is public-and-private.

signature_server_url.name: signature_server_url
signature_server_url.description: The URL and port number of the signing service. Required if auto_initialization_using_recovery_crypto_units set to true and using a third-party signing service to provide administrator signature keys. Used only if auto_initialization_using_recovery_crypto_units is set to true.

signature_threshold.name: signature_threshold
signature_threshold.description: The number of administrator signatures required to execute administrative commands. Required if auto_initialization_using_recovery_crypto_units set to true.

tags.name: tags
tags.description: Optional list of resource tags to apply to the HPCS instance.

update_timeout.name: update_timeout
update_timeout.description: Update timeout value of the HPCS instance.
